headline: Is CarMax, Inc. (NYSE:KMX) Among the Most Promising Car Stocks According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 8 Most Promising Car Stocks According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where CarMax, Inc. (NYSE:KMX)CarMax, Inc. (NYSE:KMX) stands against the other car stocks. U.S. new-car sales in 2024 continued to grow from their pandemic lows, backed by replenished inventories, increased […]
